New Records: Yu Darvish became the first Japanese pitcher to reach the 2,000-strikeout milestone
Key Match Events: Ohtani went 4-for-5 with an RBI and two stolen bases
Ohtani stole second during the third inning
Ohtani hit a tying home run in the ninth inning
Betts hit a walk-off homer in the ninth inning
Dodgers scored three runs in the seventh to pull within 5-4
Post-Match Reflections: Many people, the Rangers, Dodgers, Cubs and Padres, have supported me. This is what I've achieved with all these people. I'd like to thank everyone.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yoshinobu Yamamoto gave up five hits and walked three in three innings of work
The Rockies jumped out to a 3-0 lead in the first and made it 4-0 in the third
The two-time unanimous American League MVP has gone 14-for-18 (.778) with five home runs, 13 RBIs and six steals since Sept. 19
Ohtani scored two runs to raise his season run total to 128
Darvish fanned nine to push his career strikeout total to 2,003
